attributes.action: VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE IN THIS GOVT
attributes.additional_details: THE CURRENT UK GOVT IS ATTACKING THE MOST VUNERABLE IN SOCIETY WHILE KEEPING THE WEALTHY BANKERS AND BUSINESS IN THE GOVT POCKET WITH CORRUPT DEALINGS....THE YOUNG.DISABLED AND THOSE FIGHTING TO FIND JOBS WILL  SUFFER WHILE MILLIONAIRES KEEP A NICE TAX CUT WE HAVE ALSO LOST EVERY VITAL DEFENCE WE HAD TO KEEP THIS COUNTRY SAFE WE NEED TO VOTE NOW TO FORCE A NO CONFIDENCE DECISION IN THIS GOVT NOW BEFORE THEY DO MORE DAMAGE

rejection.details: Votes of No confidence are a matter for the House of Commons not the Government.
